description: Detecting suspicious error log events which lead to potential security threats
name: Anomaly Detection For Tomcat
query: path: "/home/cyber/research/tomcat/28_caused_by.log" and message : "Invalid method resource injection annotation" or message : "Calling hasUserDataPermission()" or message : "Skipping CSRF nonce-check for GET request to entry point" or message : "CORS Preflight request bypassing authentication" or message : "Calling hasUserDataPermission()" or message : "No umask setting was found in system property [*]. However, it appears Tomcat is running on a platform that supports umask. The system property is typically set in CATALINA_HOME/bin/catalina.sh. The Lifecycle listener org.apache.catalina.security.SecurityListener (usually configured in CATALINA_BASE/conf/server.xml) expects a umask at least as restrictive as "
